Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • Cell
  • public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a single cell in the maze Contains 4 walls (initially) and has is connected to 4 other cells in each direction

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Cell​(int special)
      Special List 0 = Nothing 1 = Entrance 2 = Exit 3 = Red coin 4 = Orange coin 5 = Yellow coin 6 = Green coin 7 = Blue coin 8 = Indigo coin 9 = Violet coin
